content: Man has an instinctive tendency to speak, as we see in the babble of our young children, while no child has an instinctive tendency to bake, brew or write.
translations: ita:L'uomo ha una tendenza istintiva a parlare, come vediamo nel balbettio dei nostri bambini, mentre nessun bambino ha la t
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by al_ex_an_der (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
